pr_title: Remove Kafka and Stream dependency on avro

timeline.message:
Remove avro depenency from Kafka modules

Streams ingestion was depending on pinot-avro (and org.apache.avro) because
the kafka-to-avro decoders depended on them, and the decoders lived in
the streams module.

Moved the decoders to pinot-avro.

Also introduced a base class to extract a pinot GenerirRow from any
input format. pinot-avro now has the class to extract a pinot row
from avro record.

Other input formats may have introduce their own extractors.

Updated tests accordingly
Cleaned up member variables in KafkaAvroMessageDecoder

timeline.bodyText: I would keep this as an interface and add a base class if you want to add some default util methods.
